data.name: Absolution
data.note:
Execution - Requires Accusations
Requires Pistol
Costs 20% fewer action points per Accusation spent
data.description:
A precision shot to the enemy's vital organs which deals damage based on combo points.
1 Accusation: 227 damage.
2 Accusations: 284 damage.
3 Accusations: 344 damage.
4 Accusations: 402 damage.
5 Accusations: 459 damage.

data.name: Aethyric Insight
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Daemon monsters, and take 5% less damage from them. As long as you are attacking an enemy of this type, you gain Morale 25% faster.

data.name: Aethyric Pandemonium
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Daemon monsters.

data.name: Aethyric Ward
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Daemon monsters, and take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Apotheosis of Flesh
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Magical Beast, Dragonoid, and Forest Spirit monsters.

data.name: Apotheosis of Mind
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Magical Beast, Dragonoid, and Forest Spirit monsters, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points. As long as you are attacking a monster of this type, your abilities will cool down 2 seconds faster.

data.name: Apotheosis of Spirit
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Magical Beast, Dragonoid, and Forest Spirit monsters, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points.

data.name: Atonement
data.description: Increases Absolution's chance to critically hit by 25%.

data.name: Benediction of Morr
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Undead monsters.

data.name: Benediction of the Dead
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Undead monsters, and take 5% less damage from them. As long as you are attacking a monster of this type, your abilities will cool down 2 seconds faster.

data.name: Benediction of Winters
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Undead monsters, and take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Blessed Bullets of Cleansing
data.description: You load your pistol with bullets designed to fragment on impact, causing your Executions to deal an additional 45 Spirit damage to the target. The victim will lose 20 Action Points, and you will gain 20 Action Points.

data.name: Blessed Bullets of Confession
data.description: You load your pistol with bullets doused in holy water, causing your Executions to deal an additional 225 Spirit damage. Any healing abilities that the victim uses over the next 5 seconds will become 50% as effective.

data.name: Blessed Bullets of Purity
data.description: You load your pistol with bullets of purest silver, causing your Executions to deal an additional 45 Spirit damage.  The victim's Initiative will be reduced by 2 for 10 seconds, and your Initiative will be increased by 2.

data.name: Blood, Faith, And Fire
data.description: Any time you land a killing blow on your enemy, all of your groupmates within 30 feet will regain 75 Action Points.

data.name: Booby Trap
data.note: Not usable on Siege Rams or Oil
data.description: You booby trap a siege ram, causing the ram to deal 98% of the original damage for the next 10 seconds.

data.name: Boon of Persistence
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Dwarf, Elf, or Human monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points. You will gain 50% more experience from these enemies.

data.name: Boon of Tenacity
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Dwarf, Elf, or Human monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points.

data.name: Boon of the Impalpable
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Dwarf, Elf, or Human monster before it will attack you.

data.name: Broad Swings
data.description: All of your attacks for the next 10 seconds will strike up to 2 additional enemies within 25 feet in front of you.

data.name: Brute Force
data.description: Increases your Strength by 160.

data.name: Burn Armor
data.note:
Requires Incognito
Builds 2 Accusations
data.description: A surprise attack that burns your target, causing them to take 125 Spirit damage each time they use a melee attack for the next 15 seconds. Your abilities will cost 50% fewer Action Points for 10 seconds. Builds 2 Accusations.

data.name: Burn Away Lies
data.note:
Execution - Requires Accusations
Target must be facing away from you
Costs 20% fewer action points per Accusation spent
Requires 13 points in Path of Judgment
data.description:
A pistol shot that fires bullets filled with fire oil, first dealing damage over 9 seconds and then igniting into a raging inferno which deals additional damage.
1 Accusation: 672 damage over time; 333 ending damage.
2 Accusations: 858 damage over time; 432 ending damage.
3 Accusations: 1047 damage over time; 524 ending damage.
4 Accusations: 1233 damage over time; 619 ending damage.
5 Accusations: 1422 damage over time; 715 ending damage.

data.name: Burn, Heretic!
data.note:
Execution - Requires Accusations
Requires Pistol
Costs 20% fewer action points per Accusation spent
data.description:
A cleansing shot of flame which deals damage to your target over 10 seconds.
1 Accusation: 534 damage
2 Accusations: 672 damage
3 Accusations: 822 damage
4 Accusations: 954 damage
5 Accusations: 1104 damage

data.name: Confess!
data.note: Requires Parry
data.description: A savage counterattack that deals 227 damage and disarms your target for 4 seconds, making them unable to use their weapons.

data.name: Confusing Movements
data.description: Concentrating on your perceived movements, you will be able to Dodge and Parry all attacks against you for 7 seconds.

data.name: Cunning Assault
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Skaven monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%.

data.name: Cunning Evasion
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Skaven monsters by 5%.

data.name: Cunning Stratagem
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Skaven monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%. You will gain 50% more experience from these enemies.

data.name: Declare Anathema
data.note: You cannot perform this action while rooted
data.description: You leap backwards from your target, causing your target to be Staggered for up to 3 seconds, preventing all actions unless they're damaged.

data.name: Divine Blast
data.description: Deals 1600 damage to all enemies in front of you, up to 65 feet away.

data.name: Dragon Gun
data.note:
Execution - Requires Accusations
Requires Pistol
Costs 20% fewer action points per Accusation spent
Requires 13 points in Path of Confession
data.description:
A pistol shot that deals damage to your target and all other enemies near them. Knocks down primary target for 3 seconds.
1 Accusation: 148 damage, 30 feet radius.
2 Accusations: 189 damage, 35 feet radius.
3 Accusations: 231 damage, 40 feet radius.
4 Accusations: 273 damage, 43.3 feet radius.
5 Accusations: 314 damage, 48.3 feet radius.

data.name: Emperor's Ward
data.description:
Any time you are attacked, there is a 25% chance that you will become protected by a magical barrier for up to 10 seconds, which will absorb up to 375 damage.
This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Encourage Confession
data.description: Blessed Bullets of Confession will now also make the target 5% easier to critical hit.

data.name: Excommunicate
data.description: For the next 15 seconds, heals will have no effects on your target. The target and all other enemies within 20 feet of them will suffer 1200 damage over 15 seconds.

data.name: Exit Wound
data.note:
Execution - Requires Accusations
Requires Pistol
Costs 20% fewer action points per Accusation spent
Requires 13 points in Path of Inquisition
data.description:
You fire a hollow point shell, dealing damage immediately and reducing the target's Toughness, Strength, and Weapon Skill for 10 seconds.
1 Accusation: 252 damage; stats reduced by 50.
2 Accusations: 318 damage; stats reduced by 75.
3 Accusations: 386 damage; stats reduced by 100.
4 Accusations: 452 damage; stats reduced by 125.
5 Accusations: 518 damage; stats reduced by 150.

data.name: Exoneration
data.description: You regain 1197 health and 180 Action Points over 9 seconds.

data.name: Expurgation
data.description: Deals 1600 damage over 10 seconds to all enemies within 30 feet and snares them, reducing their run speed by 60%.

data.name: Fanatical Cleansing
data.description: Your critical hits will inflict 50% more damage.

data.name: Fanatical Zeal
data.note:
Requires Incognito
Builds 2 Accusations
data.description: You leap from the shadows, fueled with righteous anger. Your target will take 175 Spirit damage every time they use a magical ability for the next 15 seconds. Your abilities will cost 50% fewer Action Points for 10 seconds. Builds 2 Accusations.

data.name: Faultfinder
data.description: Increases friendly ram damage by 2% for the next 10 seconds.

data.name: Favour of the Gods
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Beastmen monsters by 5%, and you take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Favour of the Mad
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Beastmen monsters by 5%, and you take 5% less damage from them. As long as you are attacking a monster of this type, your abilities will cool down 2 seconds faster.

data.name: Favour the Daemonic
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Beastmen monsters by 5%.

data.name: Feinted Positioning
data.description: Your positional attacks can be used without the positional requirement for 10 seconds. Does not affect morale abilities.

data.name: Fervor
data.note: Builds 1 Accusation
data.description: A precise incision that deals 76 damage, and an additional 216 damage over 9 seconds. This effect can be stacked up to 3 times.

data.name: Flanking
data.description: All of your attacks deal 15% more damage when you strike an enemy from the sides or rear.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30 for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Flowing Accusations
data.description: All of your Executions gain a 50% chance to restore 2 Accusations.

data.name: Force of Will
data.description: You stare down your opponent, draining 200 of their Action Points into yourself, and reducing their Strength by 160 for 30 seconds.

data.name: Frenzied Slaughter
data.description: All of your abilities will cost 25% fewer action points, cool down 50% faster, and deal 20% more damage for 7 seconds.

data.name: Full Confession
data.description: Confess! no longer costs action points, and it will nearly always critically hit.

data.name: Get Thee Behind Me!
data.description:
Detaunts all enemies within 30 feet, making them hate you less and causing them to deal only 50% damage to you for 15 seconds.
If you hit anyone that you have Detaunted, the effect will end.

data.name: Harrier's Ken
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Animal monster before it will attack you, and you take 5% less damage from them. You will gain 50% more experience from these enemies.

data.name: Harrier's Pelt
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Animal monster before it will attack you, and you take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Harrier's Savagery
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Animal monster before it will attack you.

data.name: Incognito
data.description: You begin quietly hunting for heretics, making it less likely that hostile monsters will notice you but slowly draining away your action points. This effect will end if you use any abilities, run out of action points, or after 30 seconds has passed.

data.name: Inquisitor's Fury
data.description: Each time you critically hit an enemy, your autoattack speed will be increased by 50% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Jagged Edge
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy they will begin to bleed, suffering additional 606 Corporeal damage over 9 seconds.

data.name: Last Rites
data.description: Any time you land a killing blow on an enemy, you will regain 576 health over 9 seconds.

data.name: Outmaneuver the Clever
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Greenskin monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points. As long as you are attacking an enemy of this type, you gain Morale 25% faster.

data.name: Outmaneuver the Cunning
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Greenskin monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points.

data.name: Outmaneuver the Dim
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Greenskin monster before it will attack you.

data.name: Penetrating Barbs
data.description: Increases the durations of Fanatical Zeal, Burn Armor, and Sudden Accusation by an additional 5 seconds.

data.name: Pick Lock
data.description: You bolster yourself for 10 seconds, allowing you to bypass the defenses of an enemy keep's postern door, porting you inside.

data.name: Pistol Whip
data.note:
Requires Pistol
Builds 1 Accusation
Target must be facing away from you
Requires 9 points in Path of Judgment
data.description: A quick backhand blow with the butt of your pistol that deals 277 damage and knocks your target down for 3 seconds.

data.name: Prolonged Confession
data.description: All attacks that build Accusations have a 50% chance to build an additional Accusation.

data.name: Protection from Heresy
data.description: When leaving Incognito, you will become protected by a barrier that will absorb up to 475 damage

data.name: Punish The False
data.note:
Builds 1 Accusation
Requires 9 points in Path of Inquisition
data.description: A precision blow that deals 202 damage, and causes a lingering wound which reduces the effectiveness of all healing by 50% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Razor Strike
data.note: Builds 1 Accusation
data.description: A quick precision strike that deals 227 damage.

data.name: Relentless Assault
data.description: A prolonged fervor that grants 10 Action Points a second to everyone in your group within 100 feet of you for 10 seconds.

data.name: Repel Blasphemy
data.note:
Builds 1 Accusation
Requires 9 points in Path of Confession
data.description: A melee attack that deals 277 damage. Your chance to parry attacks is increased by 100% for the next 5 seconds.

data.name: Reversal of Fortune
data.description: You turn your enemy's luck against them, dealing 1200 damage to all targets in line in front of you, up to 65 feet away from you.

data.name: Righteous Steel
data.description: Increases your chance to parry attacks by 10%.

data.name: Riposte
data.description: Each time you parry an enemy's attack, you will strike them back for 239 damage which they can not prevent.

data.name: Sanctified Bullets
data.description: Blessed Bullets of Purity will now heal you for 100% of the damage that they cause.

data.name: Seal of Destruction
data.description: A holy relic created under the tutelage of Elven mages, the Seal allows your attacks to ignore 50% the victim's armor for the next 7 seconds.

data.name: Seeker's Blade
data.note: Builds 1 Accusation
data.description: A melee attack that can not be defended against, and deals 227 damage. If the target is Ailing, then they will also become Cursed for 15 seconds, reducing their chances to block, parry, dodge, and disrupt attacks by 5%.

data.name: Seeker's Triumph
data.description: Seeker's Blade will now ignore 50% of the target's armor, and its cooldown time is reduced by 5 seconds.

data.name: Sever Blessing
data.note: Target must have a Blessing
data.description: You sever one Blessing from your enemy and do 127 damage

data.name: Sever Nerve
data.description: A directed strike that inflicts 1200 damage to your target.

data.name: Shroud of Magnus
data.description:
Rumored to be the death shroud of Magnus the Pious, this holy relic increases your chance to Disrupt enemy magic by 100% for 7 seconds.
You may only use a single relic at a time.

data.name: Sigil of Sigmar
data.description: An artifact of the Temple of Sigmar which removes all roots and snares from you. For the next 10 seconds, roots and snares will have no effect on you.

data.name: Sigmar's Favor
data.description: Any time that you are healed by a direct heal, there is a 25% chance that you will regain an additional 135 hit points as well.

data.name: Silence The Heretic
data.note: Builds 1 Accusation
data.description: A punishing blow that silences your target, making them unable to use magic for 3 seconds. If you are behind your target, then you will also deal 202 damage.

data.name: Sky Titan's Bulwark
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Ogre, Troll, and Giant monsters by 5%.

data.name: Sky Titan's Favor
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Ogre, Troll, and Giant monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%.

data.name: Sky Titan's Strength
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Ogre, Troll, and Giant monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%. As long as you are attacking an enemy of this type, you gain Morale 25% faster.

data.name: Snap Shot
data.note: Requires Pistol
data.description:
A quick pistol shot that deals 112 damage, and can be used on the run.
Your attack will snare the enemy if used behind your target, reducing their run speed by 40% for 5 seconds.

data.name: Sudden Accusation
data.note:
Requires Incognito
Builds 2 Accusations
data.description: You leap from the shadows and accuse your target of heresy. Your target will take 75 Spirit damage every time they move for 15 seconds. Your abilities will cost 50% fewer Action Points for 10 seconds. Builds 2 Accusations.

data.name: Sweeping Razor
data.description: Razor Strike will now also hit up to 2 additional enemies within 25 feet of your target, but Razor Strike will now do 10% less damage.

data.name: Torment
data.note: Builds 1 Accusation
data.description: A destructive thrust that deals 177 damage to your enemy. If you are behind your target, this attack will ignore armor.

data.name: Trial By Pain
data.note:
Execution - Requires Accusations
Requires Pistol
Costs 20% fewer action points per Accusation spent
data.description:
A barrage of withering fire that damages your target for up to 3 seconds, as long as you maintain your concentration.
1 Accusation: 67 damage per shot
2 Accusations: 84 damage per shot.
3 Accusations: 101 damage per shot
4 Accusations: 117 damage per shot
5 Accusations: 134 damage per shot

data.name: Unwavering Faith
data.description: Increases your Spirit resistance by 252.

data.name: Van Horstmann's Speculum
data.description: A tiny enchanted mirror hung around your neck, this holy relic deals 100 damage to anyone that strikes you with a melee attack over the next 7 seconds.

data.name: Vindication
data.description: Each time you disrupt an enemy's spell, you will deal 35% more damage for 10 seconds.

data.name: Vitriolic Judgement
data.description: Any time you strike an enemy in the back, there is a 25% chance that they will lose 225 points of Morale.

data.name: Witchfinder's Protection
data.description: Everyone in your group within 100 feet of you has a 50% increased chance to parry attacks for 10 seconds.
